repo.name: Xpos587 Apps Repository
repo.description: Curated collection of high-quality Android applications. Features official binaries from trusted developers, including privacy tools, communication apps, open-source alternatives, and useful utilities. Covers both FOSS and proprietary applications for enhanced mobile experience.

apps.description: Bastyon (Pocketnet) is a decentralized social network built on blockchain technology Key Features - Decentralized blockchain-based social platform - No central authority or censorship - Content rewards with POCKET cryptocurrency - Integrated wallet and payment system - End-to-end encrypted messaging - Support for images, videos, and articles - Community-driven content moderation - Mini-applications platform - Tor integration for enhanced privacy - Multi-platform support (Android, iOS, Desktop, Web) Blockchain Technology - Built on custom Pocketnet blockchain - Proof-of-Stake consensus - Content stored permanently on blockchain - No single point of failure - User-controlled data and identity Important Note Bastyon is a decentralized platform that combines social networking with blockchain technology. Users can earn rewards for creating quality content and participating in the network.
apps.name: Bastyon
apps.summary: Decentralized social network based on the blockchain

apps.description: A multi-platform proxy client based on ClashMeta, simple and easy to use, open-source and ad-free Key Features - Multi-platform support: Android, Windows, macOS and Linux - Adaptive multiple screen sizes with multiple color themes - Material You Design with Surfboard-like UI - Data synchronization via WebDAV - Subscription link support - Dark mode support - System tray support (Linux) - Android actions for automation Perfect for - Network privacy and security - Bypassing geo-restrictions - Managing proxy connections - Accessing restricted content Technical Details - Based on ClashMeta proxy engine - Built with Flutter framework - Cross-platform compatibility - Open-source and ad-free

apps.description: Happ is a mobile application designed for convenient proxy server management, powered by the robust Xray core. The app features an intuitive interface and a range of useful functions, making it an essential tool for managing connections. Features - Configuration of proxy servers based on flexible routing rules - Support for multiple modern protocols including VLESS (Reality), VMess, Trojan, Shadowsocks, Socks - Private by design - no data collection, information stays on your device - Flexible routing rules for advanced proxy management - Intuitive interface for easy connection management - Powered by robust Xray core technology Important Note Happ does not provide VPN services for purchase. Users are responsible for acquiring or setting up their own servers. Please comply with applicable laws in your jurisdiction when utilizing the app.
apps.name: Happ
apps.summary: A proxy management app powered by Xray core with support for multiple protocols.

en-US.whatsNew:
* Push notifications improvements (locale link)
* Routing profile activate/diactivate fix for update
* Fix permission message

apps.description: A powerful knowledge base on top of a local folder of plain text Markdown files Key Features - Linked thought: connect ideas with [[wiki-style]] links - Graph view: see connections between your notes - Local files: your data stays on your device - Extensive plugin ecosystem with 1000+ community plugins - Customizable themes and CSS support - Canvas for visual note-taking - Daily notes and templates - Powerful search and query capabilities - Sync across devices (paid service) - Publish notes to web (paid service) Perfect for - Personal knowledge management - Research and note-taking - Project planning and documentation - Creative writing and content creation Note Obsidian is proprietary software but free for personal use. The extensive plugin system allows deep customization for your workflow.
apps.name: Obsidian
apps.summary: Community plugins list, theme list, and releases of Obsidian.

apps.description: A V2Ray client for Android, support Xray core and v2fly core Features - Support for multiple protocols: V2Ray, Xray, Shadowsocks, Trojan, VMess, VLESS - Advanced routing with geoip and geosite data - Subscription support for automatic server updates - Built-in speed test and latency measurement - QR code scanning for easy server configuration - Import/export configuration files - Multiple proxy modes and routing rules - Support for XTLS encryption - Custom DNS settings - Statistics and traffic monitoring - Dark and light themes
apps.name: v2rayNG
apps.summary: A V2Ray client for Android, support Xray core and v2fly core

en-US.whatsNew:
### 本次更新

- 默认优先使用 HEV TUN
- 改进一些文字
- 改进了分应用设置，并在设置中的入口移除，请在抽屉菜单中进入
- 想下载 fdroid  版本打开 https://github.com/2dust/v2rayNG/releases/tag/1.10.25
- `VMess VLESS Trojan ` 分享URI 中，添加 `allowInsecure ` `insecure  `https://github.com/2dust/v2rayN/issues/8267
- 路由规则集升级，将所有 Google 域名配置为代理
